trans-unit.source: Displays a summary of all validation errors inline on a Web page, in a message box, or both.
trans-unit.target: Viser en oversikt over all validering feil linjebundet på en side, i en melding eller begge deler.

trans-unit.source: The ValidationSummary class is used to summarize the error messages from all validators on a Web page in a single location.
trans-unit.target: Klassen ValidationSummary brukes til å lage et sammendrag feilmeldinger fra alle validerer på en webside på ett sted.

trans-unit.source: You can summarize the error messages from a group of validators on a Web page by assigning the ValidationSummary control to a validation group by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Du kan lage sammendrag feilmeldinger fra en gruppe med validerer på en webside ved å tilordne ValidationSummary-kontrollen til en valideringsgruppe ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ValidationGroup%2A>

trans-unit.source: The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph, based on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.DisplayMode%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Sammendraget kan vises som en liste, som en punktliste eller som ett avsnitt, basert på den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.DisplayMode%2A>egenskapen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.DisplayMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The summary can be displayed on the Web page and in a message box by setting the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A> properties, respectively.
trans-unit.target: Sammendraget kan vises på siden og i en melding ved å angi den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>Egenskaper henholdsvis.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When you use the ValidationSummary control inside an <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control, make sure that the validator control and the control it is associated with are in the same panel.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Når du bruker ValidationSummary kontrollen i en <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontroll, må du kontrollere at validerer kontrollen og den er knyttet til kontrollen er i samme panel.</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For more information about using the <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel> control for partial-page updates, see [Partial-Page Rendering Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For mer informasjon om hvordan du bruker den <xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>kontrollere for delvis siden oppdateringer, kan du se [delvis siden gjengivelse oversikt over](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.UpdatePanel>

trans-unit.source: For a list of initial property values for an instance of ValidationSummary, see the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: En liste med opprinnelige verdier for en forekomst av ValidationSummary, kan du se den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.%23ctor%2A>konstruktør.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Accessibility For information about how to configure this control so that it generates markup that conforms to accessibility standards, see [Accessibility in Visual Studio and ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) and [ASP.NET Controls and Accessibility](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Tilgjengelighet For informasjon om hvordan du konfigurerer denne kontrollen, slik at den genererer markup som overholder tilgjengelighet standarder se [tilgjengelighet i Visual Studio og ASP.NET](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md) og [ASP.NET-kontroller og tilgjengelighet](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property value for an instance of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser første egenskapsverdien for en forekomst av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: |Property|Initial Value| |--------------|-------------------| |ForeColor|`Color.Red`|
trans-unit.target: | Egenskapen | Standardverdi | |--------------|-------------------| | ForeColor |`Color.Red`|

trans-unit.source: Adds attributes to the HTML tags generated for this control.
trans-unit.target: Legger til attributter i HTML-koder som er generert for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Output-dataflyten som gjengir HTML-innhold til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the display mode of the validation summary.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir visningsmodusen for valideringen sammendrag.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the display format of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi visningsformatet for en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: The summary can be displayed as a list, as a bulleted list, or as a single paragraph.
trans-unit.target: Sammendraget kan vises som en liste som en punktliste eller som en enkelt avsnitt.

trans-unit.source: One of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDisplayMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDisplayMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_BulletList" name="BulletList" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_BulletList" name="BulletList" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The display mode is not one of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDisplayMode"></xref> values.
trans-unit.target: Visningsmodus er ikke én av de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummaryDisplayMode"> </xref> verdier.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control updates itself using client-side script.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> kontrollen oppdateres ved hjelp av skript på klientsiden.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify whether the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control updates itself using client-side script.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi om <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollen oppdateres ved hjelp av skript på klientsiden</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `true`, client-side script is rendered on the client to update the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control, if the browser supports that feature.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `true`, skript på klientsiden gjengis på klienten til å oppdatere den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollerer om nettleseren støtter funksjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: When this property is set to `false`, no client-side script is rendered on the client and the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control only updates itself on round trips to the server.
trans-unit.target: Når denne egenskapen er satt til `false`, ingen skript på klientsiden gjengis på klienten og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontroll bare oppdateres på runde reiser til serveren.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: In this situation, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A> property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: I dette tilfellet den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> control updates itself using client-side script; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> kontrollen oppdateres ved hjelp av skript på klientsiden; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir forgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to specify the color in which error messages from validation controls are displayed.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å angi farge meldinger fra validering Kontroller vises som en feil.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"></xref> that represents the foreground color of the control.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Drawing.Color"> </xref> som representerer forgrunnsfargen for kontrollen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_Red" name="Red" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_Red" name="Red" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the header text displayed at the top of the summary.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir toppteksten vises på toppen av sammendraget.

trans-unit.source: Use this property to display a title for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control.
trans-unit.target: Bruk denne egenskapen til å vise en tittel for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontroll.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: The HeaderText property is not HTML encoded.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen HeaderText er ikke HTML-kodet.

trans-unit.source: Therefore, HTML tags can be included in HeaderText.
trans-unit.target: HTML-koder kan derfor inkluderes i HeaderText.

trans-unit.source: The value of this property, when set, can be saved automatically to a resource file by using a designer tool.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for denne egenskapen Hvis du velger, kan lagres automatisk på en ressursfil ved hjelp av en designer verktøyet.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Globalization and Localization](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>og [ASP.NET globalisering og lokalisering](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.ComponentModel.LocalizableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The header text displayed at the top of the summary.
trans-unit.target: Toppteksten vises på toppen av sammendraget.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.Init"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: After this method calls the base control's <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A> method, it sets the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A> property to <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> if the following conditions are true: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A> property is not already set.
trans-unit.target: Når denne metodekall base kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>metoden, den angir den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen <xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A>Hvis følgende betingelser er oppfylt: - <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A>egenskapen ikke er allerede angitt.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Drawing.Color.Red%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ForeColor%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.Control.OnInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version earlier than 4.
trans-unit.target: - <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskapen angir en ASP.NET-versjon eldre enn 4.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: By default, in ASP.NET 4 and later versions, validator controls do not display error messages in red.
trans-unit.target: Som standard vises i ASP.NET 4 og nyere versjoner validerer kontroller ikke feilmeldinger i red.

trans-unit.source: For information about how to control the visual appearance of validator controls, see [Validating User Input in ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Du finner informasjon om hvordan du styrer utseendet til validerer Kontroller [validering brukerinndata i ASP.NET Web Pages](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: The event data.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsesdata.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Hever den <xref href="System.Web.UI.Control.PreRender"> </xref> hendelsen.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.EventArgs> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.EventArgs>som inneholder Hendelsesdata.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Sends server control content to a provided <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"></xref> object, which writes the content to be rendered on the client.
trans-unit.target: Sender serverinnholdet til en angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.HtmlTextWriter"> </xref> -objektet som skriver innholdet som skal vises på klienten.

trans-unit.source: The output stream that renders HTML content to the client.
trans-unit.target: Output-dataflyten som gjengir HTML-innhold til klienten.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the validation summary is displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen sammendrag vises i en melding.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A> property to control where the validation summary is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>egenskap til kontrollen der valideringen sammendrag vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A> are both set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in a message box.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A>er satt til `true`, valideringen sammendrag vises i en melding.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A> is set to `false`, this property has no effect.
trans-unit.target: Hvis <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A>er satt til `false`, denne egenskapen har ingen virkning.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.EnableClientScript%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the ShowMessageBox and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A> properties are set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in both a message box and on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge ShowMessageBox og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>egenskapene til `true`, valideringen sammendrag vises i både en melding og nettsiden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowSummary%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation summary is to be displayed in a message box; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringen sammendrag som skal vises i en meldingsboksen. Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether model-state errors should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om modellen statuser feil skal vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if model state errors should be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis modellen tilstand feil skal vises; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the validation summary is displayed inline.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen sammendrag er innebygde.

trans-unit.source: This property can be used in addition to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A> property to control where the validation summary is displayed.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan brukes i tillegg til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>egenskap til kontrollen der valideringen sammendrag vises.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: If this property is set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen settes til `true`, valideringen sammendrag vises på siden.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If both the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A> and ShowSummary properties are set to `true`, the validation summary is displayed in both a message box and on the Web page.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Hvis begge av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>og ShowSummary egenskapene er angitt `true`, valideringen sammendrag vises i både en melding og nettsiden.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary.ShowMessageBox%2A>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation summary is displayed inline; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis validering sammendraget innebygde; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the validation summary from validator controls should be displayed.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en verdi som angir om valideringen sammendrag fra validerer kontroller skal vises.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the validation summary from validator controls should be displayed; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis valideringen sammendrag fra validerer kontroller skal vises; Ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the control should set the <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""></xref> attribute of the rendered HTML element to "disabled" when the control's <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Henter en verdi som angir om kontrollen skal angi den <xref uid="langword_csharp_disabled" name="disabled" href=""> </xref> attributtet i det gjengitte HTML-elementet til "deaktivert" når kontrollens <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.IsEnabled*>

trans-unit.source: This property indicates how ASP.NET should render HTML for a control when the control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapen angir hvordan ASP.NET skal gjengi HTML for en kontroll når kontrollen er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `true`, ASP.NET renders a `disabled` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `true`, ASP.NET gjengir en `disabled` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: If this property is `false`, ASP.NET renders a `class` attribute when a control is disabled.
trans-unit.target: Hvis denne egenskapen er `false`, ASP.NET gjengir en `class` attributt når en kontroll er deaktivert.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebControl.SupportsDisabledAttribute%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property indicates an ASP.NET version lower than `4.0`; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.RenderingCompatibility%2A?displayProperty=fullName> egenskapen angir en ASP.NET-versjonen som er lavere enn `4.0`; ellers <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> object displays validation messages.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> objektet viser valideringsmeldinger.

trans-unit.source: Validation groups allow you to assign validation controls on a page to a specific category.
trans-unit.target: Valideringsgrupper kan du tilordne validering Kontroller på en side til en bestemt kategori.

trans-unit.source: Each validation group can be validated independently of other validation groups on the page.
trans-unit.target: Hver valideringsgruppe kan valideres uavhengig av andre valideringsgrupper på siden.

trans-unit.source: Use the ValidationGroup property to specify the name of the validation group for which the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> control will summarize error messages.
trans-unit.target: Bruk ValidationGroup-egenskapen til å angi navnet på valideringsgruppen for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>kontrollen vil lage et sammendrag feilmeldinger.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: When you specify a value for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary> property, only error messages from the validation controls that are part of the specified group are summarized.
trans-unit.target: Når du angir en verdi for den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>egenskapen bare feilmeldinger fra validering kontrollene som er en del av den angitte gruppen summeres.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary>

trans-unit.source: If you do not set a value for this property, all error messages from validation controls on the page that are not assigned to a validation group are summarized.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du ikke angir en verdi for denne egenskapen, oppsummeres alle feilmeldinger fra validering vises på siden som ikke er tilordnet til en valideringsgruppe.

trans-unit.source: This property cannot be set by themes or style sheet themes.
trans-unit.target: Denne egenskapen kan ikke angis ved oppsett eller stil arket Oppsett.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute> and [ASP.NET Themes and Skins](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, se <xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>og [ASP.NET tema og skallene](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Web.UI.ThemeableAttribute>

trans-unit.source: The group of controls for which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"></xref> object displays validation messages.
trans-unit.target: Gruppen med kontroller som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.ValidationSummary"> </xref> objektet viser valideringsmeldinger.
